saved_lists.title: Saved Lists
saved_lists.no_lists: You don't have any saved lists yet
saved_lists.name: Name
saved_lists.read_later_description: Content saved to read at another time
saved_lists.public_list_info: Public lists are visible to other users
saved_lists.about_description: Lists allow you to organize your favorite news and articles for easy access later.
saved_lists.about_read_later: Save content to read at another time.
saved_lists.tip_1: Use 'Favorites' to save articles you love.
saved_lists.tip_2: Use 'Read later' for content you want to review later.
saved_lists.tip_3: Create themed lists to organize content by interests.
saved_lists.tip_4: Make your lists public to share them with others.
saved_lists.list_tip_1: Add notes to articles to remember why you saved them.
saved_lists.list_tip_2: Delete articles from the list when you've read them.
saved_lists.list_tip_3: Sort articles by date or votes according to your preferences.
saved_lists.sharing_private_info: Private lists can only be viewed by you.
saved_lists.add_posts_instruction: Explore content and use the save button to add articles.
saved_lists.try_again: An error occurred while trying to save this post. Please try again in a few moments.
saved_lists.added_to_favorites: The post has been added to your favorites for easy access later.
saved_lists.added_to_read_later: The post has been saved to read later. It will be waiting for you when you have time to review it.
saved_lists.added_to_list: The post has been successfully added to the list "{name}".
saved_lists.added_to_new_list: The new list "{name}" has been created and the post has been added successfully.
saved_lists.access_favorites_info: You can access your favorites at any time from the profile menu or directly in the "Saved > Favorites" section.
saved_lists.access_read_later_info: Access your reading list from the profile menu or in the "Saved > Read later" section.
saved_lists.access_list_info: You can manage all your custom lists from your profile in the "Saved > My lists" section.
saved_lists.new_list_info: You can add more content to this list at any time and manage it from your profile.
saved_lists.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete the list '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
saved_lists.clear_warning: Are you sure you want to delete all articles ({count}) from the list '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
